introductionText: The Honda MSX 125 Grom is a lightweight and agile mini street bike, known for its sporty design and excellent fuel efficiency. Its unique appearance, playful yet aggressive body, and smooth 125cc engine make it an ideal choice for urban commuting and casual riding.
advantage1: Lightweight body and low seat height
advantage3: Low maintenance costs and high customizability
advantage6: 5-speed gearbox suitable for both short and long rides
advantage7: Gear indicator and ABS braking system

carousel.title: Side View 1
carousel.text: A serene beauty captured through light and composition.

carousel.title: Side View 2
carousel.text: Same angle, different vibe. Facing left adds a calm, ready-to-roll feel.

carousel.title: Boss Cat
carousel.text: Boss Cat adds a touch of life to this still journey.
